short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze and highlight internal links on any webpage, excluding headers and footers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔍 Boost Your SEO with Our Internal Link Checker Extension! 🚀

Optimize your website's structure and skyrocket your search rankings with the Internal Link Analyzer Tool! 📈

✨ Key Features of The Internal Link Checker Tool:
• Instantly scans and highlights internal links on any webpage
• Smart filtering: Excludes header and footer links for focused analysis
• Comprehensive link data: URL, anchor text, and link type (follow/nofollow)
• Easy selection, copying, and downloading of link information
• "Next Link" feature for effortless navigation through your page

🛠️ How Internal Link Analyzer Works:

1. Install the extension with one click
2. Navigate to any webpage you want to analyze
3. Click the extension icon to activate the Internal Link Checker
4. View a detailed list of all internal links on the page
5. Use the intuitive interface to interact with the discovered links


🔧 Powerful Functionality:
• Link Highlighting: Visually identify internal links on the page
• Link Selection: Choose specific links for further analysis
• Bulk Actions: Select all or deselect all links with a single click
• Data Export: Copy URLs or download a comprehensive report
• Link Navigation: Use the "Next Link" feature to cycle through links

👥 Perfect For:
• SEO Professionals
• Content Creators
• Website Owners
• Digital Marketers
• Web Developers

💪 Benefits of Using The Internal Link Analyzer Tool:
• Improve website structure and navigation
• Enhance user experience
• Identify and fix broken internal links
• Optimize link equity distribution
• Boost search engine rankings

🏆 Take control of your internal linking strategy today with our Internal Link Checker extension!

📊 Start analyzing, optimizing, and improving your website's internal link structure now!
